channel.title: Stats
channel.description:
how do i change the max combat and max stats??
thanks,

item.title: Stats
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:5, topic:260706”][quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=344260.msg2657194#msg2657194 date=1233953079]

[quote author=SandScape link=topic=344260.msg2657179#msg2657179 date=1233952678]

how do i change the max combat and max stats??

thanks,
[/quote]client.java
[/quote]player.java =.=

i checked both of those…

searched for 135 but nothin in player.java[/quote]YEAH HES RIGHT ITS IN PLAYER.JAVA

SEARCH FOR THIS

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {

then edit this

 for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= **; lvl++) {
            points += Math.floor(
                    (double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
            output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
            if (output >= exp) {
                return lvl;
            }
        }
        return **;

thos * are where your skill numbers are and you change the skill to get high cmb like if you change those to 107 it will be combat lvl 172\gl
